items.sentence: Why not just tell us what it is you want to do?
Tom will be in Boston for the next three weeks.
Tom drummed his fingers on the table nervously.
Tom got fired because he was rude to customers.
Tom has lost a lot of weight since last summer.
Tom has three children from his first marriage.
What do you think might be causing the problem?
What foreign countries would you like to visit?
What made you change your mind all of a sudden?
Excuse me, could you lower your voice a little?
Generally, women live 10 years longer than men.
Let\'s see if we can find out what\'s going on.
Let\'s stay together. It\'ll be safer that way.
Has anyone told you about what really happened?
Have you been playing basketball all afternoon?
Have you changed your profile picture recently?
Have you decided whether you want to go or not?
I was afraid that I might hurt Tom\'s feelings.
Let\'s get a picture of us together for my mom.
Let\'s have a tea party the day after tomorrow.
Let\'s list all the reasons we need to do this.
Let\'s list all the reasons we should be happy.
Tom told Mary that she didn\'t need to do that.
I don\'t know whether the story is true or not.
I don\'t think I realized how much I loved you.
I don\'t think I want to study French with you.
I don\'t think Mary is as pretty as her sister.
I don\'t think Tom can deal with the situation.
I don\'t think anyone really knows the real me.
Tom had an allergic reaction to the medication.
Tom had no intention of going there by himself.
Tom has played the piano since he was thirteen.
We have to get as much information as possible.
We have to stay here whether we want to or not.
We need at least eight hours of sleep each day.
Tom isn\'t as poor as most people assume he is.
Tom doesn\'t have what it takes to be a leader.
Tom doesn\'t have what it takes to be the boss.
I don\'t want to be stuck in an office all day.
I don\'t want to hear anything more about that.
I feel like eating something that isn\'t sweet.
I think it\'s dangerous to walk alone at night.
I think it\'s time for me to abandon that idea.
Tom didn\'t know Mary spoke French so fluently.
Tom didn\'t know anyone who could speak French.
Tom didn\'t know how many cups of sugar to add.
Tom didn\'t know how to ask the right question.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary was already married.
Don\'t worry. We\'ll get to the bottom of this.
I wonder why Tom suggested we do that together.
